about_the_game:
This is a simple roguelite FPS where you can shoot without reloading.

As the energetic engineer "Sara", you will blow up hordes of evil aliens and protect the peace of the Earth!

Key Features

  • Shoot without reloading or resupply.

    You can fire your weapon as much as you want without reloading. And you have unlimited ammo, so you don't even have to look for it. Enjoy the exhilaration of shooting and defeating enemies!

  • Go on a rampage with dual wielding.

    Sara can use any weapon with one hand. With dual wielding, you can unleash overwhelming firepower!

  • Randomly generated levels.

    Each level is randomly generated, and rarely is a level exactly the same, even in the same location. Enemies and items that appear also change randomly each time.

  • Get stronger and try again.

    Your progress will be lost when Sara is defeated. However, if you use your prize money to buy new power-ups, you can try again even stronger.

  • Five difficulty levels.

    You can play on five difficulty levels, from the easiest Comical mode to the extremely difficult Hell mode. Can you finish the game in Hell mode?
